name: Aragorn
description: Known first as Strider, a mysterious Ranger of the North, Aragorn is the heir to the throne of Gondor who has lived in exile, protecting the free peoples from the shadows. His noble lineage is matched by his exceptional skills as a warrior, healer, and leader. Though burdened by the weight of his destiny, he embodies the best qualities of both his Númenórean heritage and his Elvish upbringing - wisdom, courage, and compassion. His journey from ranger to king mirrors the restoration of hope to Middle-earth.

features.name: Favored Enemy
features.description: You have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to orcs and evil men. You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track them, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

features.name: Natural Explorer
features.description: You are particularly familiar with forests. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to forest terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.

biography.appearance: A tall, weathered man with dark hair and grey eyes, wearing well-worn ranger's garb
biography.backstory: The heir of Isildur and rightful king of Gondor, raised among the elves of Rivendell under the name Estel
biography.personalityTraits: Patient and wise, carrying the weight of his heritage with dignity
biography.ideals: To protect the free peoples of Middle-earth and restore hope to the world of Men
biography.bonds: Devoted to Arwen and the legacy of his ancestors
biography.flaws: Sometimes doubts his worthiness to claim his heritage
